pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 28, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, August 28, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an important announcement. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery and are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office in advance. Media will have access to the Rideau Hall grounds as of 11:15 a.m. and should be in position no later than 11:50 a.m.
    • Media contact:
      Marie-Ève Létourneau
      Rideau Hall Press Office
      613-998-0287
      613-302-0912 (cell)
      marie-eve.letourneau@gg.ca

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a working dinner for King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Closed to media.
